title: Boutique Summer Luxury in the Victorian High Country
description: Hike through rolling green hills, ascend soaring mountains and escape in style to the award-winning QT Falls Creek with a romantic weekend escape. A boutique five-star retreat in the Victorian hills, this adventurer’s dream getaway includes daily à la carte breakfast, a complimentary bottle of sparkling wine and chocolates on arrival, unlimited on-demand movies and guaranteed 1pm late checkout so you can take your time revelling in the serene High Country atmosphere.
offer_address: 17 Bogong High Plains Rd, Falls Creek VIC 3699

title: QT Alpine Luxury with Balcony Hot Tub
description:
Wake up to the bliss of mountain mist and uninterrupted valley views in a boutique apartment at QT Falls Creek. The ultimate hikers’ paradise in summer, this Victorian High Country escape delivers vintage chalet chic and alpine elegance all year round.

With a steamy outdoor hotel spa and a private hot tub on every balcony, romance abounds at this top-tier hotel. Make the most of the incredible QT facilities including the indoor plunge pool and spa, ski lodge-inspired Stingray Lounge, the stressless paradise of spaQ and the Bazaar - a unique marketplace dining experience.

Your handpicked inclusions:

- Guaranteed upgrade to a One-Bedroom Spa Apartment with a hot tub on the balcony
- Daily continental breakfast at the après ski-inspired Stingray Lounge
- One welcome drink per adult at the Stingray Lounge
- Make the most of every moment with a guaranteed 1pm late checkout
offer_address: 17 Bogong High Plains Rd, Falls Creek VIC 3699
